title: Determine K for the reverse reaction H2 and Br2

content.prompt:
H2(g) + Br2(g) â‡„ 2HBr(g)

At a certain temperature, the value of the equilibrium constant, K, for the reaction represented above is 2.0 x 105. What is the value of K for the reverse reaction at the same temperature?

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
